postData.contentHtml:
I've built and uploaded a test version of Firebird 4.0.0 for Raspberry Pi (aarch64).

It has been built in a Raspberry Pi 4 running Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS with an additional commit to make it more compatible with different Linux distro versions.

Feedback is welcomed.

https://github.com/asfernandes/firebird/releases/tag/v4.0.0-aarch64-asfernandes
postData.title: Firebird 4.0.0 build for Raspberry Pi (aarch64)
postData.author: Adriano dos Santos Fernandes
